data.title: ActionAid Afghanistan
data.text:
We're a global justice federation working to achieve social justice, gender equality and poverty eradication.

In Afghanistan we focus on ending violence against women and girls, promotion of inclusive and resilient livelihoods, promote resilience among the right holders and promote civic participation.
